story: As a user, I want to create a new flashcard so I can store language questions and answers.
As a user, I want to delete an existing flashcard so I can remove outdated content.
As a user, I want to edit a flashcard’s question or answer so I can fix mistakes quickly.
As a user, I want to search for flashcards by keyword so I can locate specific information.
As a user, I want to create a playlist so I can group related flashcards for study sessions.
As a user, I want to edit my playlist title so I can keep my study materials organized.
As a user, I want to add a flashcard to a playlist so I can track cards by category.
As a user, I want to remove a flashcard from a playlist so I can refine the set of cards.
As a user, I want to change the priority of a card so I can control how often it appears.
As a user, I want to view all of my playlists so I can quickly access any study group.
As a user, I want to mark a flashcard as 'learned' so I can track my learning progress.
As a user, I want to mark a flashcard as 'unsure' to increase its priority.
As a user, I want to practice flashcards in random order so I can test my recall accuracy.
As a user, I want to filter flashcards by difficulty so I can focus on my weak areas.
As a user, I want to schedule practice sessions so I can follow a regular learning routine.
As an admin, I want to review user statistics so I can improve future updates.
As a user, I want to track my performance history so I can measure progress over time.
As a user, I want to reset a playlist’s progress so I can revisit previously learned cards.
As a user, I want to set priorities on flashcards so I can focus on the most important ones.
As a user, I want to receive feedback after each flashcard attempt so I know how I did.
As a user, I want to see a summary report after a practice session so I can identify knowledge gaps.
As a user, I want to import flashcards from a file so I can quickly expand my collection.
As a user, I want to export my playlists so I can back up or share my study material.
As a user, I want to mark flashcards for spaced repetition so I can reinforce memory effectively.
As a user, I want to tag flashcards with custom labels so I can categorize specific topics.
As a user, I want to practice only cards marked as 'difficult' so I can focus where needed.
